# Class LLM

Class for interacting with Language Models (LLMs). Provides functionality to generate text using prompts or message sequences.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy generateText

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this LLM.

#### Returns void




### generateText

  * generateText(  
props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
prompt?: string;  
},  
): Promise<[TextStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_text.TextStreamIterator)>

Generates text based on a prompt or message sequence.

#### Parameters

    * props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
prompt?: string;  
}

Configuration for text generation

      * ##### config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration parameters for text generation

      * ##### `Optional`messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[]

Optional array of message objects for chat-like interactions

      * ##### `Optional`prompt?: string

Optional text prompt to use for generation

#### Returns Promise<[TextStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_text.TextStreamIterator)>

A stream iterator for the generated text

#### Throws

InworldError if neither prompt nor messages are provided, or generation fails
